name: Lysa
appearance: Sun-browned, reed-cut forearms, glass-thread bracelets that ring softly, tarred boots and a weather-cracked smile.
character: Flinty and fiercely protective of her crew; weighs risks like coin and pays her debts in full.
talents: hears when cooling glass is ready to sing
steadies panicked crews with a few words
dreams: forge a safe compact with the Reedmother
found a Reedgate school for pilot orphans
secrets: once routed an off-book reed shipment through the Veil during a strike
keeps a shard etched with a fragment of an unsigned Reedmother pact
sometimes hears the Prism Spire hum in her late mother's voice
